item.title: "Come Back with the Shield, Or..." - One Page Adventure #2
item.description: Explore a shipwreck, fight bandits, and make friends in this week’s one-page adventure! It’s up to them to recover a stolen shield after a courier ship gets waylaid by pirates. Let me know what you (and your players!) thought of this adventure on Twitter or Instagram. As always, thanks for your support. Happy adventuring!

item.title: "There's Goblins in the Mine!" - One Page Adventure #1
item.description: My first one-page adventure takes players to the forest hamlet of Abruan, where goblins have commandeered the local mine. It’s up to your players to take back the mine in the name of the city! Let me know what you (and your players!) thought of this adventure on Twitter or Instagram. As always, thanks for your support. Happy adventuring!
